user_data.target_needs: I wanted to fulfill my need for comfortable, durable clothing that offers good value for money and can be worn casually on a daily basis.
purchase_reason: I was drawn to this product because of its warm and comfortable interior, which is perfect for everyday wear. The durability of the zipper and the presence of roomy pockets were also significant factors in my decision. The price was appealing, and I felt it offered good value for the quality I received.

I chose this item primarily for its premium softness and the benefits it offers, such as wicking and odor protection. The positive reviews and the reputation of the brand played a role in my decision, as I wanted something that would keep me comfortable throughout the day. The price was also a key factor, as it felt like a good investment for the quality.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that are well-made, comfortable, and fit properly. I value features such as softness, durability, and a good fit, especially when it comes to clothing and accessories. I appreciate items that are versatile and can be used in various situations, whether for casual wear or specific activities. Additionally, I tend to favor products that offer a good balance of quality and value for money. On the other hand, I dislike items that are too tight or constricting, as they can be uncomfortable and impractical. I also have a low tolerance for poor quality or items that do not meet my expectations in terms of fit and comfort.
